config.sql2: WITH t1 AS( SELECT E.DIM_COMPANY , QNMB QNMB01, LJSJ LJSJ01, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ01, (LJSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE01, ( CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((LJSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ),4)*100 END) TBZJL01, WCL WCL01, NVL(DYS,0) DYS01, NVL(TQS,0) TQS01 FROM ( SELECT DIM_COMPANY, FACT_B AS LJSJ, FACT_A DYS FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND DIM_PERIOD=:period) E LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACT_B SNTQ, FACT_A TQS, DIM_COMPANY FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod) G ON E.DIM_COMPANY=G.DIM_COMPANY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAB1.DIM_COMPANY , TAB2.FACT_A QNMB, ( CASE WHEN TAB2.FACT_A=0 THEN 0 ELSE TAB1.FACT_B/TAB2.FACT_A*100 END) WCL FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD TAB1 LEFT JOIN DW_FACTTARGETASSESSMENT TAB2 ON TAB1.DIM_COMPANY=TAB2.DIM_COMPANY AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=TAB2.DIM_PERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=:period) F ON E.DIM_COMPANY=F.DIM_COMPANY) , T2 AS ( SELECT E.DIM_COMPANY , QNMB QNMB02, LJSJ LJSJ02, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ02, (LJSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE02, ( CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((LJSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ),4)*100 END) TBZJL02, WCL WCL02, NVL(DYS,0) DYS02, NVL(TQS,0) TQS02 FROM ( SELECT DIM_COMPANY, FACT_B AS LJSJ, FACT_A DYS FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND DIM_PERIOD=:period) E LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACT_B SNTQ, FACT_A TQS, DIM_COMPANY FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod) G ON E.DIM_COMPANY=G.DIM_COMPANY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAB1.DIM_COMPANY , TAB2.FACT_B QNMB, ( CASE WHEN TAB2.FACT_B=0 THEN 0 ELSE TAB1.FACT_B/TAB2.FACT_B*100 END) WCL FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD TAB1 LEFT JOIN DW_FACTTARGETASSESSMENT TAB2 ON TAB1.DIM_COMPANY=TAB2.DIM_COMPANY AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=TAB2.DIM_PERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=:period) F ON E.DIM_COMPANY=F.DIM_COMPANY ) SELECT H.SCODE GSBM, H.SNAME GSMC, H.spcode pid, QNMB01, LJSJ01, SNTQ01, TBZJE01, TBZJL01, WCL01, QNMB02, LJSJ02, SNTQ02, TBZJE02, TBZJL02, WCL02, DYS01, TQS01, DYS02, TQS02 FROM T1 LEFT JOIN T2 ON T1.DIM_COMPANY=T2.DIM_COMPANY RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT SCODE, SNAME, spcode FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE PROPERTY1='1' AND CISDEL='N' AND SPCODE LIKE :company||'%' OR scode=:company) H ON T1.DIM_COMPANY=H.SCODE ORDER BY T1.DIM_COMPANY, H.SCODE

WITH t1 AS( SELECT E.DIM_COMPANY , QNMB QNMB01, LJSJ LJSJ01, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ01, (LJSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE01, ( CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((LJSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ),4)*100 END) TBZJL01, WCL WCL01, NVL(DYS,0) DYS01, NVL(TQS,0) TQS01 FROM ( SELECT DIM_COMPANY, FACT_B AS LJSJ, FACT_A DYS FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND DIM_PERIOD=:period) E LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACT_B SNTQ, FACT_A TQS, DIM_COMPANY FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod) G ON E.DIM_COMPANY=G.DIM_COMPANY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAB1.DIM_COMPANY , TAB2.FACT_A QNMB, ( CASE WHEN TAB2.FACT_A=0 THEN 0 ELSE TAB1.FACT_B/TAB2.FACT_A*100 END) WCL FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD TAB1 left join DW_FACTTARGETASSESSMENT TAB2 ON TAB1.DIM_COMPANY=TAB2.DIM_COMPANY AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=TAB2.DIM_PERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1416001' AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=:period) F ON E.DIM_COMPANY=F.DIM_COMPANY) , T2 AS ( SELECT E.DIM_COMPANY , QNMB QNMB02, LJSJ LJSJ02, NVL(SNTQ, 0) SNTQ02, (LJSJ-NVL(SNTQ, 0)) TBZJE02, ( CASE WHEN (NVL(SNTQ, 0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((LJSJ-SNTQ)/SNTQ),4)*100 END) TBZJL02, WCL WCL02, NVL(DYS,0) DYS02, NVL(TQS,0) TQS02 FROM ( SELECT DIM_COMPANY, FACT_B AS LJSJ, FACT_A DYS FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND DIM_PERIOD=:period) E LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACT_B SNTQ, FACT_A TQS, DIM_COMPANY FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND DIM_PERIOD=:comparePeriod) G ON E.DIM_COMPANY=G.DIM_COMPANY LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAB1.DIM_COMPANY , TAB2.FACT_B QNMB, ( CASE WHEN TAB2.FACT_B=0 THEN 0 ELSE TAB1.FACT_B/TAB2.FACT_B*100 END) WCL FROM DW_FACTFINANCEPERIOD TAB1 left join DW_FACTTARGETASSESSMENT TAB2 ON TAB1.DIM_COMPANY=TAB2.DIM_COMPANY AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=TAB2.DIM_PERIOD WHERE DIM_ITEMPERIOD='1403100' AND TAB1.DIM_PERIOD=:period) F ON E.DIM_COMPANY=F.DIM_COMPANY ) SELECT H.SCODE GSBM, H.SNAME GSMC, QNMB01, LJSJ01, SNTQ01, TBZJE01, TBZJL01, WCL01, QNMB02, LJSJ02, SNTQ02, TBZJE02, TBZJL02, WCL02, DYS01, TQS01, DYS02, TQS02 FROM T1 LEFT JOIN T2 ON T1.DIM_COMPANY=T2.DIM_COMPANY RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT SCODE, SNAME FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE PROPERTY1='1' AND CISDEL='N' AND SPCODE LIKE :company||'%' OR scode=:company) H ON T1.DIM_COMPANY=H.SCODE ORDER BY T1.DIM_COMPANY,H.SCODE
